name: Die Dice
description:
Die Dice is a shooter platformer where you play as a dice who can control fate itself by rolling dice, He need to save the world from all the non white dice.


INSTRUCTIONS:

  -> If enemies have a larger dice number then you you cannot attack them but they can,

  -> If you have a larger dice number then your enemy they cannot attack you but you can >: )

  -> Press e to change everyone's fate i.e there dice number,

  -> Finish all 3 stages to defeat enemy dice people :D


CONTROLS:
WASD or Arow keys to move
space to jump
left click to shoot
E to use fate power


Thank you for playing.

Pixel ART and MUSIC/sfx :https://twitter.com/vell_yeah
Development: https://twitter.com/dave_copy  https://twitter.com/JustPanda10
